container-title: 2. Insert the HSMCS disk in Drive 1
title: TRS-80 Network III: 1. Boot the system as usual with the Network III software in Drive 0
At each student station, load the Network III system and
To access the HSMCS program from the student stations
The HSMCS program will LOAD and RUN
The student should then type the NUMBER for the drill program assigned
At the end of the drill, the student has the option to continue the same drill or choose another drill
If another drill is requested, the MENU program will be accessed and the student can load a new drill program
